title: Firebolt App Manifest: Distributor Config: Fallback Config

fallbackType.description: @TODO. If the app fails to launch for a supported reason, react accordingly (show error, launch previous version of the app, launch swap app) based on FallbackType. Default: null, which means the Aggregated Experience will either show an error message and/or launch 'the standard' failure-to-launch app. device_sku_not_supported: Current device is excluded due to allowedDeviceSkus or excludeDeviceSkus property. authorization_failed: The App Catalog specifies an authorization server and the authorization attempt failed based on response from the server (not due to networking issue).
